text: Llinos Golding, Baroness Golding (born 21 March 1933) is a Labour Party politician. She currently sits in the House of Lords. She is a radiographer and worked in the NHS and currently serves as Patron of the Society of Radiographers.Lady Golding's Statement on the 19 May incident ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:Labour Life Peers Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs
title: Llin Golding, Baroness Golding
